learnoer.name: Learn OER
learnoer.description: Learn OER is a search engine for finding free to read books online. Search for fiction, non-fiction and textbooks and the odds are good that you'll find a result that is freely available.
learnoer.contribution: Learn OER is a personal project of mine inspired by a Lambda School assignment. I created everything from the UI to the backend API.

trashpanda.name: Trash Panda
trashpanda.description: Trash Panda makes it easy to find out how and where to recycle your items using a category search or image recognition.
trashpanda.contribution: My main contributions to this project were the home page UI implementation, camera interface, the backend graphql structure and integration with the custom machine learning image categorization API.

devdesk.name: Dev-Desk Queue
devdesk.description: Dev-Desk Queue is a proof of concept issue tracker to allow students and helpers submit and receive support on whatever problem they are having.
devdesk.contribution: My main contribution to Dev-Desk was the back-end API design and implementation.
